result.title: D2.2 Co-creation Catalogue (incl. documented Open source healthcare solutions)
result.description: The teams of stakeholders - patients, healthcare professionals and makers - will co-design and co-produce open healthcare solutions fitting their needs. Each of their co-produced solutions will be published on the platform. At the end of the project 50 new open source healthcare solutions will be available on the Made4You website for further replication. Five open source healthcare solutions based on parametric design are published on the platform. These showcases inspire stakeholders to personalised solutions and demonstrate the benefits of digital fabrication.

result.title: Market Research, Business Models & Financial Analysis for Sustainability - Final Report
result.description: (MYD/AVU) Final report report (updated from D2.1 with the knowledge and data acquiered during the project) aimed at covering the following questions: (i) How is the market and what are its especial localization needs? (ii) What is the best business model to capture value? (iii) How we will financially sustain the project after its end? The deliverable will contain: business and technology evaluation, analysis of the state of the art, differences from existing competing services and competitive advantages, prices, maintenance costs, supply chains considering the localisation aspects of the Sub-Saharan market.

result.title: D4.3 Final Impact Assessment Report incl. Impact Assessment Package
result.description: This report summarizes the evaluation results of the project and the validation of the overall impact at social, economic, political and technological level.
